Package com.jpmorrsn.fbp.text

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Affix
    Affix each packet IN with the given Strings PRE before and POST after, and copy it to OUT.
    DedupeSuccessive
    Prevent successive identical strings.
    DuplicateString
    Component to copy all incoming packets to OUT and DUPLICATE
    FieldLimits
    Provide maximum field lengths from a stream of character-separated records
    LineToWords
    Provide words from a stream of space-separated records Bob Corrick December 2011
    LowerCase
    Convert to lower case Bob Corrick December 2011
    Obscure
    Obscure single characters in each packet IN with the given char OBS (unless they match the char EXC) and copy to OUT.
    PadFields
    Pad fields to given length in a stream of character-separated records
    ReplaceRegExp
    Replace every FIND String (Java regular expression) in each packet IN with the given REPLacement String and copy to OUT.
    ReplaceString
    Replace FIND String in each packet IN with the given REPLacement String and copy to OUT.
    StripPunct
    Strip punctuation Bob Corrick December 2011
    WordsToLine
    Provide measured lines from a stream of words Bob Corrick December 2011
